channel.title: Republicans on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Republicans on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Magic Phrase Behind Donald Trump’s Power Grab
item.description: The Trump administration frequently invokes the president’s priorities to justify its actions—regardless of whether they align with the law.

item.title: The Magic Phrase Behind Donald Trump’s Power Grab
item.description: The Trump administration frequently invokes the president’s priorities to justify its actions—regardless of whether they align with the law.

item.title: A Dark Money Group Is Secretly Funding High-Profile Democratic Influencers
item.description: An initiative aimed at boosting Democrats online offers influencers up to $8,000 a month to push the party line. All they have to do is keep it secret—and agree to restrictions on their content.

item.title: A Dark Money Group Is Secretly Funding High-Profile Democratic Influencers
item.description: An initiative aimed at boosting Democrats online offers influencers up to $8,000 a month to push the party line. All they have to do is keep it secret—and agree to restrictions on their content.

item.title: James Talarico Is on the Run
item.description: WIRED spoke with the Texas state representative, who is hiding out in Illinois along with his colleagues in an attempt to stop Republicans from enacting an unprecedented redistricting plan.

item.title: James Talarico Is on the Run
item.description: WIRED spoke with the Texas state representative, who is hiding out in Illinois along with his colleagues in an attempt to stop Republicans from enacting an unprecedented redistricting plan.

item.title: Trumpworld Knows Epstein Is a Problem. But They Can’t Solve It
item.description: Unmet expectations have pushed some of the president’s allies to the brink. “Honestly, like, fuck Trump,” a Trumpworld source who works in conservative media tells me.

item.title: These Democrats Think the Party Needs AI to Win Elections
item.description: The National Democratic Training Committee has made the first official playbook for the use of AI by Democratic campaigns ahead of the midterms.

item.title: Bring On the MAGA Revolt
item.description: Donald Trump’s own strategists and advisers aren’t sure the president’s base will survive Jeffrey Epstein’s ghost.
